file_content.text: Theron. You made it back.
Yeah. We almost got caught in one of the blasts. It was bad down there.
Koth. Not like this.
You know how many people you killed? You want to tell me why I shouldn't walk out right now?
Arcann's going to pour immense resources into repairing and securing the Spire. Those are resources that aren't being used against us.
We had a tactical opportunity.
What happened was a horrible mistake. I couldn't stop it. All I can say is that I tried.
[Lie] It was all an accident.
Try harder next time.
He's right. Those people aren't our enemy.
Took a look at that data you stole. A schematic of the Spire is gonna come in handy.
You're a traitor to Zakuul and you have nowhere to go. You may not like my decisions, but I'm your only hope of stopping Arcann.
You're a bad bluffer.
Maybe. But some victories aren't worth the price.
The man has a point.
So, Kaliyo. She knows her stuff. We keeping her?
There are few people in the galaxy I'd rather have at my side.
I can count on her.
That mean I shouldn't lock up the silverware?
I didn't say that.
She's smart, she's dangerous, and she knows enemy territory. I think we can work with her.
She's a good fighter.
All right. We'll call this recruiting op a success.
The woman has spirit. If nothing else, she'll make our lives interesting.
She livens things up.
Funny--I thought they already were.
Maybe, but don't trust her.
I can work with Kaliyo, and I won't deny she can be useful. But be very careful around her, and be ready to cut her loose.
She knows her way around the Spire and she can handle a gun. I don't think we can turn her away--but she's also a liar and a killer.
Understood. I'll get her a bunk and add her to the watch list.
You were the Lady of Sorrows?
Yes.
Guess you knew if I found out, I'd melt you down.
Did you know she was Firebrand?
It pleases me to see you partnered again.
Not an answer.
Still creepy after all these years. Can't believe you found her before me.
I didn't know it was her at the time. If I had, I would have approached the situation differently.
I was just as surprised.
I have to ask... you were pretty angry back there. Are we alright? You and me?
Is everything okay with us?
We talking about our feelings? Yes, fine. You and me, Agent: we're good.
SCORPIO may be dangerous, but when it comes to establishing a power base and overthrowing an empire....
I had to prioritize somehow.
Yeah, right. It's fine, we're good.
Lokin is here too.
Look, I'm not going to promise to be around all the time. I've got a lot of catching up to do... I kind of wasted those years on Zakuul.
But we had something good. You ever need me, I'm here.
Kaliyo... I can only guess what you went through these past five years. But nothing's changed for me.
We still have something good.
If you really did know, you might say different.
I know you well enough.
You really think you can slip away like that? If we're going to break up, I expect shouting.
Not so fast. [Kiss her]
Look, it's been a long time. No judgment. I'm not clingy.
No judgment. But I haven't forgotten.
Fine. Guess we're back at it.
So you going to show me where you bunk, or do I need to find it myself?
I'm glad you're alive.
Same here.
Five years changes a lot of things. We did have something. Better for both of us to move on.
Our romance is over.
Like I haven't already. But Agent?
But if you need me, I'm here.
It should go without saying--but whatever happens, if you need anything, put the word out. I'll find you.
Same goes for you.
Just might take five years, huh?
What does "catching up" on the galaxy entail?
What are you going to do?
Might visit Koru Neimoidia again. Spent a while there before Zakuul, kind of left a guy hanging.
Come on. We're going to find something to drink and swap stories. And Agent?
Given your track record, I'm not sure what a promise like that is worth.
You've never been very loyal.
Ah, you'd be dead a hundred times over without me. But Agent?
Yes?
I'm glad you're alive.
You two know each other?
Yeah, we're old buddies. Ask who built her sometime.
You will receive no satisfactory answer.
Not a bad little operation you've got here. Can't promise to stick around all the time, but when you're making a big move, say the word.
You make it sound like you've got other plans already.
Going somewhere?
Take a look around, meet the others when you can. Talk to Theron or Lana if you have ideas; I'm sure you have a lot to offer.
We're glad to have you.
Yeah... I tried the team player thing, don't think I'm up for it again. I'll probably head offworld, touch base with old pals.
If you're going to use our resources, you play by our rules. Don't make me regret bringing you in.
I expect you to stay in line.
Tell you what: If I stab someone in the back, you'll go first. For now, I want Arcann gone, same as you.
Been a while since I left Zakuul. Might be worth touching base with some old pals.
Anyone I should know?
Mostly thugs who want me dead. Hutts, Black Sun, Exchange. Someone must still like me.
Sounds like you've made your share of enemies.
You've led an active life.
I like to keep busy and I don't stay anywhere long. Lots of chances to know people.
Done the piracy thing, Revolutionary Edge Brigade on Brentaal... sponged off a Senator's daughter once.
One thing you'll learn about me: I always get by.
I'm sure you do.
Now you've got me curious. Why don't we grab a drink and you can share your list of enemies?
[Flirt] Tell me more.
You show me your secrets, I'll show you mine? Could be fun, but... nah.
I'm too old for head games, and that's all I'm good for with women. Besides which, I actually kind of like you.
I'm too old for head games. I could twist you around my finger, but... it's not as fun as it used to be.
Fair enough. I'd still take a drink and a story, anytime you feel like it--no need for anything more.
Huh. In that case, Outlander... maybe we can get along.
Do what you need to do. Just don't bring any troubles back here.
I'll leave you to it.
I'll see you around, then. And hey--good luck.
We both lost a lot of years to Zakuul. Time to start making up for it.
City's going to take a while to recover from the droid shutdown... but no one got killed. Thanks.
Anyway, I might head offworld awhile, look up old pals.
That'll happen when you blow up my city. There are parks and roads burning.
That'll be a fun reunion.
